about_the_game:
This is an "Ensemble RPG" that pursues sound quality and human drama while inheriting the fundamental fun of RPGs, such as "adventure" and "combat," and reconstructing it based on a classic fantasy world with the elements of "music" and "growth."

◯ Focus on "Sound"
This game is created by a musician. The scenes where characters perform or engage in musical exchanges are filled with a variety of musical expressions, a hallmark of this game. Additionally, vocal mixing technology has been applied to voice editing, allowing you to enjoy high-quality voices that distinguish it from other indie games.

◯ A Story Focused on "People"
The game adopts narrative techniques typical of visual novels, where the story unfolds through conversations. It places significant emphasis on delicate psychological portrayals, letting you enjoy the diverse expressions of unique characters.
With the performances of 12 voice actors, the game brings its atmosphere to life in vivid detail, making it a perfect experience for fans of audio dramas.

◯ Seamless Immersion
A linear system has been adopted to thoroughly eliminate any risk of interrupting the story. From start to finish, the game progresses smoothly like turning the pages of a novel, offering an immersive experience in its world.
While the freedom of modern open-world games is undoubtedly appealing, why not take a moment to embrace a story-driven experience and immerse yourself in its profound depth and richness?

[Controls]

  • Full Screen: F4

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys

  • Confirm: Z / C / Enter / Left Click

  • Cancel/Menu: X / Back / Right Click

(Gamepad Supported)

short_description: A fantasy RPG featuring music. The curious boy Pato sets out on a journey with his childhood friend Belffie in search of legendary instruments. Eventually, they come to bear a great destiny. An adventure story with full voice acting.
